oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 1960-06-28 Wallis Deposition Subpoena
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: law; libraries; civil rights; desegregation; Wallis, C. Lamar; 1960s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Deposition subpoena for C. Lamar Wallis, asking that he provide "All records dealing with the organization, financing, methods of operation, purposes, name and location of all facilities under the management and control of the Memphis Public Library Board, information as to facilities available at each such installation, and all other data pertaining to the Memphis Public Library, not otherwise covered hereinabove, and all minutes covering the past five years."
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Johnson, W. Lloyd, Clerk
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: United States District Court for the Western Division
